Posts.Content: Hi, New to this group and recently diagnosed with stage 2 breast cancer. I am having a lumpectomy on Tuesday and my surgeon has given me 2 options which I have to decide on by tomorrow! One is therapeutic mammoplasty and the other involves a fat graft/ injection to fill the space. Anyone have advice or preference on which I should go for?  Thanks in advance.
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy options help please!

Posts.Content: Thank you for you reply and good luck to you too! Can I ask if you were given the 2 options as well and if so which you are going for?
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy options help please!
